allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix admin sign-in by syncing auth session to cookies

The browser Supabase client was using @supabase/supabase-js which only
stores sessions in localStorage. The server-side auth checks read from
cookies, so the session was never visible server-side. Switched to
createBrowserClient from @supabase/ssr which writes to both localStorage
and cookies. Re-enabled middleware session refresh to keep cookies alive.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\howar\\mystros" add package.json package-lock.json src/types/database.ts src/components/ui/dialog.tsx src/components/ui/tabs.tsx src/components/ui/checkbox.tsx src/components/ui/slider.tsx src/lib/actions/attendance.ts src/lib/actions/sap.ts src/lib/actions/competencies.ts "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/page.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/attendance-manager.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/clock-in-form.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/active-sessions.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/clock-out-modal.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/attendance-table.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/attendance/correction-requests.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/page.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/student-detail-client.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/student-overview.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/student-attendance-section.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/student-sap-section.tsx" "src/app/\(admin\)/admin/students/[id]/student-competencies-section.tsx" src/components/admin/student-roster-table.tsx supabase/migrations/00006_phase1_competencies.sql)
